fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Attack a player each night. If they don't die, convert them to Neutral Evil and change their goal to "See Mac, Overseer of Flame win the game." If they do die, they may choose whether or not to be converted within the next 24 hours, but the conversion won't be reflected in the graveyard if they do so.
**Infernal Ultimatum** â€” Deal a Powerful attack to up to three players. Convert them to Neutral Evil and change their goals to "See Mac, Overseer of Flame win the game."

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the beginning of each night, you may decide an attack value for the night from among None, Basic, Powerful, Unstoppable, Overkill, and Negative. Negative attack revives dead players and does nothing to living players. You may only use each attack value once.
- You may target dead players if your attack is Negative.
- You will know at all times all players who have the goal "See Mac, Overseer of Flame win the game."
- You may multitask 133: Shrooms's ability once for literally no reason.
